description: A word cloud is a collection of words organized into a shape. Classic.wordclouds.com allows you to create word clouds in different shapes, colors, and sizes. Examples of when you might make a word cloud include organizing commonly used words or memorializing a description of your childhood home. After creating a word cloud, you can export it as an image or share it to a social site, such as Facebook or X.
NOTE: Zygomatic replaced classic.wordclouds.com with WordClouds.com, which saves word clouds as .WCLD2 files instead of WCLD files.
